Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a two-player version of the Reversi game on the "board" shown in the main area of the application window and updates the other areas accordingly.
    Version:
    2021.05.19
    Author:
    Radiance O. Ngonnase
